description:
It’s no surprise that DC has several upcoming film projects in the works. After all, there’s the DCU and a variety of stand-alone projects including Joker: Folie à Deux to look forward to. Unfortunately, it’s been confirmed that one of the most highly-anticipated DC movies has now been given a major delay. This news was [...]

The post Highly-Anticipated DC Movie Gets Major Delay appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Highly-Anticipated DC Movie Gets Major Delay

description:
One of the most unique feature films from director Steven Spielberg is officially getting a sequel. The fan-favorite blockbuster, released in 2018, is officially having its story continued with an all-new movie. As shared in a new report, Spielberg will be involved with the new sequel as a producer. This will be a change as [...]

The post Sequel To Fan-Favorite Steven Spielberg Movie Moving Forward appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Sequel To Fan-Favorite Steven Spielberg Movie Moving Forward
